response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We understand its immense value to you stands at $800,000, and we aim to honor this by offering it to you at a price that reflects its true worth while ensuring a fair transaction for both parties. We kindly propose a price of $950,000 for the product. This offer not only ensures a substantial return for us but also allows you to secure an exceptional asset at a competitive price. Should you require any further information or have questions about the product, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
